column4: When I start my system alsa does not work untill i have started alsamixer the first time. How can that be?
After boot or after starting alsamixer?
whenever, just read through, its gonna be a long read but should tell you whats going on
There is nothing related to alsa or my soundcard in dmesg
o but does the soundcard come up ok?
no, in the dmesg, does the card get an irq and get setup correctly?
I don't think so, what should i grep for?
I have read it, but i wasn't able to find something related to the soundcard. But there is a lot of cryptic pci stuff, maybe there it is.
However after running alsamixer, it works, even though there are no new entries in dmesg.
weird, bit of a hack but you could autorun alsa mixer to get you sorted
I now, that i could do it. but this is ugly.
i'd use it for now until you can work it out
you could try reinstalling alsa, or compile it
I have already done apt-get --reinstall install alsa-base alsa-utils; dpkg-reconfigure alsa-base alsa-utils
